msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Initialize softKeyboardEffectCachedHeightExplicit on first ACTIVATE event.
SDK-31830 SPUC SK Effects: SPUC move does not work when keyboard is activated
Tests run: checkintests, manual SkinnablePopUpContainer tests
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
For iOS, SkinnablePopUpContainer ignores soft keyboard events when orientation is changing.

When computing callout max size and soft keyboard effects, use the original cached height instead of the current height in order to stabilize position and sizing. Clear explicit height (due to Resize effect) if the pop-up originally had no explicit height. Allow explicit height settings during the soft keyboard effect to clobber the cached height.
SDK-31726 [ios] SPUC SK Effects: Callout when resized and turned orientation, arrow points in the wrong direction
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Use explicit height instead of layoutBounds height when restoring original SPUC size after SK effect. Use event capture phase to act on SK events before Scroller does. Clean up cached position and height when SK state changes.
Rely on ACTIVATE instead of ACTIVATING due to potentially missing SK events that the runtime will not fix.
SDK-31533 iOS:SkinnablePopUpContainer moves up and down when Text components are tapped on
SDK-31681 SPUC SK Effects: SPUC does not resize back on keyboard de-activate (Callout does)
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
ASDoc update to indicate pop-up owners can not be a descendant. Remove FIXME.
SDK-31429 RTE and eventual app crashes when the owner of the callout is set to the first view navigator or its children
